<title level="1" right="Action">[Arrest a Fall](/Actions.aspx?ID=91) <actions string="Reaction" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 472 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Trigger** You fall.

**Requirements** You have a fly Speed.

</column>

---

You attempt an [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) check to slow your fall. The DC is typically 15, but it might be higher due to air turbulence or other circumstances.

**Success** You fall gently, taking no damage from the fall.
name: Arrest a Fall
